review: Wonderful little device for the price. I also own an Amazon Fire TV.  I wanted another streaming device but couldn't justify purchasing another Fire TV that wouldn't be used as much so I went with the Fire TV Stick. It has most of the same functions at a lower price.  While visually everything looks the same as the Fire TV, the Fire TV Stick does struggle at times when navigating the menus especially within the apps such as hbo go.  But once you start playing the videos all is well. No performance issues during playback.  If you are looking for something that gets the job done as a capable streaming device and can endure the sluggish menu navigation, get the Fire TV Stick.
